reviews.sentence: Great Staff 5Star Hotel. Staff location Room.
Nice hotel at Thonglor area. Location best croissant Calin rest next to hotel helpful staffs Short and sweet Need to relok at the bathtub design.

Nice serviced apartment with good value for staying in Thong Lo area. Very spacious room 1 bed room suite with comfortable bed and sofas. Washer Dryer in suite is nice to have. Fairly quiet not much noise from neighbors. Nice location situated in the middle of Thong Lo. Bathroom shower tub design has a very tall wall to climb over. Not very convenient and somewhat dangerous when trying to get out of it with wet feet. A bit of walking distance from BTS Thong Lo. Shuttle is provided every hour but not really practical. Every half hour would be more desirable practical.

Great personal service. The staff is really service minded personal professional and easy to talk to. Everybody speaks very good English and there is no problem they can not fix. Shuttle service to BTS otherwise a 10 min walk. Perfect hotel for anybody who wants exceptional service and luxurious rooms.

Great location for good value. The service was good at Pan Pacific and the options at breakfast were more than what I remembered from 4 years ago. The lounge was also a nice bonus as was the washer dryer in the room. Wifi was strongwe had to change rooms because our room started to smell very musty from the air conditioner. It almost smelled like urine. Even in our second room the smell started to come after the second day. We have stayed at pan pacific many times over the course of years and this was the first time we had any issues. The bathtub configuration is also an issue for anyone who can not lift their legs high and the water kept going from hot to cold.
Out of my expecting. Good locationNice staff.

Stayed here for 6 days the mall connected Has 24 hrs fodland with diner at basement. Yummy cakes and ice cream booths. Very spacious beautiful and luxury room. Reception bellboy Staffs are very attentive professional and friendly. Housekeeping has prompt service. Super comfy bed linens that made me Want to stay in bed all day. Had Great selection of variety during breakfast and 24hrs gym to workout any time. Would definitely stay here again.

Good hotel but the staff are not friendly. This is a very nice and beautiful hotel and some of the rooms are renovated but I did not get a chance to get to stay in the renovated room. Otherwise the whole hotel room is nice and spacious. Would consider going to stay again.

Top notch. A lovely small hotel which prides itself on service. Gym pool lounge shuttle bus restaurant. Amazing comfortable bed and excellent bathroom. AClose to all thonglor has to offer easy to reach from the Airport unlike hotels in the heart of Bangkok.

Wonderful stay excellent service. The hotel was very nice and luxurious especially after we stayed across Thailand in more moderate rooms. The staff was very nice and forthcoming. The service was excellent. Prices are a bit high but it seems normal in this area. We would stay there again though.

My room smells unpleasant. My room smells unpleasant. It was an unpleasant smell like underground humid smell and cigarette smell but the smell was worse when the air conditioner was operated. Except for the smell the room size service location facilities and everything was satisfactory.
Location Service Value for Money. Friendly Staff good location spacious room. Hotel has shuttle service to Thonglor Station24 hours grocery shop.
Clean modern flat free wifi no noising but the staff is a little bit rude with pl named sandra. thank you.

Good. the staff. from the first moment i entered to the last goodbye. the staff were all smilesthe bath and shower are by far the worst i ’ve ever encountered in thailand. the bath would probably take 45 minutes to fill the shower barely trickled. plus the shower head was placed too far away so you could n’t actually stand under it.

Valentine day 14th Feb 2019. We are there for a staycation on 2019 Valentines day. Booked the room way in advance early December 2018. Email them to enquire of what service they could provide related to the room settings decorations or etc. Each email receive definitely takes you more than 10days. The longest I had is 20days for one reply which cut short my preparation to the special day. The room is great bed is amazing. For the location if you are driving or require taxi in out the road is always congested. Eateries is not that much in the day time. I choose this hotel because the location is where I wanted to be. But with the email service courtesy and the traffic. You could definitely get a far better experience with the value you are paying. Just need to reconsider if you are planning anything special here due to the respond time. The rest is acceptable.

The Akyra hotel is a fantastic hotel from its room perspective. Comfortable with a heavenly bed. The Team is very friendly. The only downfall is the restaurant breakfast is a desaster. Very poor food offering. Buffet never refilled and service battles. No management presence at all. Still gave 4 stars because of the room.

Very impressed. I have stayed in many hotels and this is definitely one of my best experience. I stayed in the one bedroom apartment which is very spacious and bed is also very comfortable. The service from the staff was excellent and the hotel is close to cafes bars and have a supermarket in the same building. The only minor ‘ issue ’ is that the location is quite a Long walk to the BTS station and the complimentary tuk tuk service ends at 8 pm. I highly recommend this hotel and definitely be back again.

Well located modern hotel with a fab roof pool and cool speak easy. The hotel was very clean. The pool breakfast and bar areas were modern bright and clean. Also having modern amenities etc. The gym was well put together with a nice mix of machines and weights. Our room was very spacious and we loved that we had a washing machine in the room. The concierge during our stay did not have a good knowledge of places around and recommended average places. It would have been nice to have suggestions that are cool and trendy to see. Due to the location i guess they have issues with pests we see them a few times spraying chemicals down and they wanted to put this in our room. We understood but did not like the fact.

Boutique Hotel. We stayed at this Hotel for a little change and very happy with the choice. Staff all very friendly helpful and Hotel was very clean. Rooms spacious and clean with good facilities in the room and beds very comfortable. Breakfast choices would be my only complaint as ai do n’t think many on the menu. The pool area was small but ample with sun beds and towels on hand. You are maybe a 15 minute walk from the BTS but the Hotel offer a shuttle service very 30 mins and if you notify the Hotel on your return they will pick you back up. I would definitely use this Hotel again as in a nice vibrant area of Bangkok with restaurants and cafe close by.

Comfortable and clean location was great too. Location is great. near good restaurants and massage places. Don Donki mall is a few streets away. Shuttle to the BTS station provided as well. Very modern and clean rooms. There was an unpleasant musty smell in the room as you enter it. The housekeeping staff tried to spray air freshener but it did not help. Sound proofing could be improved.

Location was great with many food options around the area. Rooms and bed were comfortable. And most of all the staff were amazing — they were extremely friendly and helpful. We had an issue with a Grab driver and one of the staff came out to help.

PERFECT HOLIDAY. I spend 150 days year in Hotel and rarely take the time for a review. This hotel and its staff deserves it. I felt happy and timeless. Notably employees Reception Wave Punce Pae Mok. Bell boy Ya. The entire breakfast crew.

Hospitable staff. The hotel is modern with great stylish facilities. Our suite was comfortable with nice design touches. The rooftop pool offered respite after busy hot city trips. Thong Lo sky train station is within walking distance but there is a free hotel shuttle service. We found it extremely easy to visit the sites ourselves with clear instructions from the concierge. On the down side there was a fair amount of traffic noise not enough to interrupt sleep. We felt that breakfast choices although good however the quality of some of the food was below expectations. The staff are very kind helpful and always smiling confirming the best of Thai hospitality.

A little gem in the midst of thriving Thonglor. Akyra Thonglor is a wonderful hotel. I stayed two weeks. It feels like a family hotel with lots of dedication care attention. From reception to concierge to cleaning to restaurant the staff has a wonderful attitude and help where they can. The facilities are nice rooms are spacious. Highly recommended.
